body.name: HOMORE Shag Area Rug for Living Room, 5x8 Memory Foam Rugs for Girls Bedroom, Fluffy Modern Indoor Area Rug and Carpets for Children Kids Nursery Bedside Play Room Decor,Pink/White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 18 mins
features: Must Read Before Purchasing: The pink area rug is vacuum sealed and may arrive thin than original and temporarily creased, please shake it and flatten it to give the sponge and creases time to recover, or machine wash in cold water on a gentle cycle before first use, which will result in a faster recovery of the memory rug

Soft and plush to walk on, the bedroom rugs constructed with thick pile on surface and 0.3 inch memory foam in middle, not only provide a soft touch but also reduce the noice for child, kids, nursery, toddler
Beautiful shag geometric designs and a luxurious underfoot feel make plush rugs an elegant decor to the living room, bedside, children's, nursery, toddler, dorm room or home office

Durable and Low Maintenance: The 5'x8' area rug is durable and non slip since the high quality polyester pile and rubber backing, low pile design make the kids rug easy to clean, simply vacuum away dirt and blot spills with a dry cloth to remove from carpet
HOMORE modern area rugs in neutral colors provide a sophisticated look for any room decor, and the geometric pattern design gives the rug a design and premium look

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice rug
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews prior to purchasing and this does come in a shrink type package. I ordered two of these the first one I opened and did not follow the instructions. followed the directions for the second one and opened the package let it plump up then took it out of package laid it flat for 24 hours and the wrinkles were gone and it looks nice under my dining room table. It is very soft and the color is lovely. The rug is very soft and just enough padding. It is not super thick but in my opinion perfect.The other one I will be using in my living area that I did not follow directions when opening does have an area with a bunch of wrinkles but I have laid it out and for 3 days now before putting in living area and they are disappearingThere was not a smell like some were writing about it was ever so faint and was gone within an hour. I am very happy I purchased and my advice is follow the directions when opening.For the price these are great and I would buy more if I have the need loved they arrived next day too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: Came vacuum sealed in bag. Laid out flat and still needs time to settle but super soft. Not slipping on my floating floors. I purchased the 9x13 for my girls bed room. Helps keep the floor from being cold. My 5 year old asked to sleep on it if that says anything haha!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but weird smell
reviews.reviewText: It very soft and nice but the smell from it is so strong I’ve vacuumed it’s 3 times and put carpet fresh on it and it’s taking over my living room with the smell 👃 very very strong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a 7FT by 5FT…What I received was this crinkled up BARELY 4x6. So, for starters it does not lay flat and on top of that? It was the wrong size!!!Its also SUPER THIN, like a toddlers blanket.I’m really upset that I wasted my money on this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love the carpet! It was just the right size for our new couch! We have to vacuum it with a Dyson hand vacuum so it doesn’t get caught in the vacuum! However, our regular one is very heavy duty pet vacuum! Either way, very easy to clean, feels great to walk on, and looks amazing! Almost had it for two months!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Quality and Feel, But Thin With Very Little Padding
reviews.reviewText: This is an average, decent rug at an above average retail price. We purchased it with the current $13 off coupon and, with that discount, it brought the price down to what this quality of carpet should be offered for every day.When you hear the term "shag," most folks envision a thick carpet with flowing fibers. That is not the case here. This is absolutely a low pile, thin carpet with very little padding. Indeed, when you get down to the last page of the description, you learn that the entire 5'x7' carpet is less than 0.3 inches thick and weighs slightly less than 5 pounds. The backing is not truly "non-slip," though it is advertised as such. The "non-stick" feature is actually a series of tiny bumps of a sort of rubberized substance. We tested the non-stick claim by placing the rug on a Travertine tile entryway and the rug could still slide in each directly while being walked on by a grown adult. Better than having nothing on the bottom, but still a long way from being fully non-slip.To be sure, it comes shrink-wrapped. You need to lay it out fully and flat and give it a day or two to have it return to original size and get rid of the folds. Our rug did not feature any smell that some other reviewers have mentioned.All in all, an ordinary and average quality area rug that should handle minimal traffic. Nothing fancy, just a functional rug at a decent price point (with the discount coupon).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bad first impression but ended up exceeding expectations
reviews.reviewText: I needed a cheap replacement rug so my expectations weren't high for the price range but I was very unhappy when I first opened it from its tiny shrinkwrapped brick. It felt like a cheap bathmat that I was going to be returning. On a whim I threw it in the dryer on a low setting with a damp towel hoping to get the wrinkles/creases out and it dramatically improved in only about 10-15. It went from looking nothing like the pictures to very nice looking and feeling. I know it's supposed to air out but the dryer trick instantly turned it into a keeper. I would have left a negative review like some others if I relied on the first impression and sent it back. I doubt it would be durable enough for repeated shoe traffic but it feels great on bare feet in the bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So so so soft!
reviews.reviewText: Soft and fuzzy and pretty Color was as expected, sits nicely on floor and does not gap or slip, quality is good, but it’s not used much (in spare bedroom) Value for $ is great. Really like this rug!
